Package it.polimi.se2019.server.controller

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AbstractDeathController
    This class implements some useful methods used when calculating points.
    CardController
    This class handles the generic interaction with a Card that can both be a Weapon or a Power Up.
    Controller
    This class is extended by all the controllers used in the Server.
    DeathController
    This class handles the death of a player and the subsequent calculation of points in all of the phases of the game: during the match, at the end of it and during a final frenzy turn.
    MatchController
    This class handles the disconnection and reconnection of a user from the match pausing and unpausing the players to allow the game to continue.
    MatchMakingController
    This class creates the match and groups players in a single room.
    PowerUpController
    This class handles the events concerning power up usage throughout a turn.
    SetUpController
    This class handles events that concern the game preferences of the players before the game begins, for instance the number of rounds they wish to play, their preferred map or whether they wish to play in final frenzy mode.
    TurnController
    This class handles the interaction with a user throughout its turn, showing them the possible combos to use, allowing them to spawn or respawn and refreshing the game board at the end of the turn before moving on.
    WeaponController
    This class handles all the interaction with the view concerning weapon usage.
